body:
Hey everyone, so I had a friend recommend this idea to me and actually isn't a bad idea.

So basically we will be watching a movie as a group on TeamSpeak, now the movie won't be some big summer blockbuster, but the movie will be fairly well known. We will basically be using YouTube to watch the movie and using the site Watch2gether to have a whole bunch of people view it. 

So I just need times recommended to watch the movie, I was thinking sometime this weekend, however I just want all of your opinions. We would also like movie suggestions as well so comment them. 

However, I already know the movie for this weekend, and that movie is...

Pokemon: The Rise of Darkrai!!!!

So everyone get excited hopefully we have a good turnout!

You can submit your movie suggestions here!

replies.body:
Hello everyone!

I am unfortunate to announce that the movie night will not be happening tonight. My computer was supposed to be fixed by tonight, and it wasn't. So I'm excited to say that next weekend, we will be doing a double feature! It will be Pokemon (Rise of Darkrai) and... Drum Roll Please.... 

Guardians of the Galaxy!!

So everyone get excited for next weekend because I am! See you all then! :]
